projects.title: AI Video Chat
projects.desc: Video chatting website made with WebRTC and Backend with Django  . It has inbuilt AI and ML based Sign language rocognition  to detect the speech from it

projects.title: Eccomerce Product ordering

projects.title: Automate Live Attendance Marker
projects.desc: Created an Automate Face Detected  Attendance counter for student. with Python scikit-learn library for learning faces and OpenCV for Image processing.
